scripts.clean: rimraf dist distTest libEs5 libEs6 types
scripts.test: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run && pnpm run test:scripts
scripts.test:coverage: rimraf coverage && pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:unit: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --project=unit
scripts.test:unit:debug: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --no-file-parallelism --project=unit --browser=chromium --browser.provider=playwright --browser.headless=false
scripts.test:unit:watch: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --project=unit
scripts.test:unit:coverage: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --coverage --project=unit
scripts.test:integration: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --project=integration
scripts.test:integration:debug: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --no-file-parallelism --project=integration --browser=chromium --browser.provider=playwright --browser.headless=false
scripts.test:integration:watch: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --project=integration
scripts.test:integration:coverage: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --coverage --project=integration
scripts.prepack: pnpm run clean && babel packages/core/src -d libEs5 --env-name npmEs5 && babel packages/core/src -d libEs6 --env-name npmEs6 && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > libEs5/package.json && echo '{"type":"module"}' > libEs6/package.json && pnpm run types
